sentences.english: Objective To establish a qualitative standard of Shehua granules .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蛇花顆粒製劑的質量標準。

sentences.english: The cost-effective of the controlled group showed a remarkable advantage over FDC.
sentences.chinese: 對照組藥物的成本效果分析優於FDC製劑。

sentences.english: Additional validation may include investigation of samples from dosed subjects.
sentences.chinese: 額外的驗證可能包括樣品製劑後的調查。

sentences.english: Intravenous preparations take more risk than oral preparation and externally applied agent.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈給藥製劑相對口服和外用製劑而言，風險較大。

sentences.english: Intravenous preparations take more risk than oral preparation and externally applied agent.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈給藥製劑相對口服和外用製劑而言，風險較大。

sentences.english: Intravenous forms of indomethacin and ibuprofen are not available in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗目前尚無消炎痛和布洛芬的靜脈製劑供應。

sentences.english: In addition, the film formulation also has a dissolve time that is twice as fast as tablets.
sentences.chinese: 另外，該薄膜製劑的溶解時間較舌下片快2倍。

sentences.english: The research doesn't apply to other preparations.
sentences.chinese: 而此研究沒有提供其它的製劑產品。

sentences.english: Objective: Study on characteristics and function for Entercoccus faecium viable bacteria preparations.
sentences.chinese: 對屎腸球菌活菌製劑的特性及功效進行研究和分析。

sentences.english: Conclusions Manufacture process of amoxicillin granules is good, stable and under control.
sentences.chinese: 結論該阿莫西林顆粒製劑工藝較好，且水平穩定可控。

sentences.english: The suitable therapy is gonadotropic agents of two-step compound therapy.
sentences.chinese: 最佳的治療方法是用促性腺製劑及兩階段複合治療。

sentences.english: The results of two-one sided t-test showed that the two preparations were bioequivalent.
sentences.chinese: 雙單側t檢驗結果表明，兩種製劑具有生物等效性。

sentences.english: This paper made a brief description on the principles of leaching gold by biologicals.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡要論述了生物製劑浸金的原理。

sentences.english: The pellet preparation can be prepared into a slow-release or enteric-coated preparation as required.
sentences.chinese: 上述微丸製劑可以按照要求製備成緩釋或腸溶製劑。

sentences.english: The pellet preparation can be prepared into a slow-release or enteric-coated preparation as required.
sentences.chinese: 上述微丸製劑可以按照要求製備成緩釋或腸溶製劑。

sentences.english: Q6. What are the key points patients need to know about PEPs?
sentences.chinese: 問題6。病人需要了解胰腺酶製劑的哪些關鍵問題？
